summary: Provides a calibration framework for the COPD component of a health simulation model, orchestrating simulation setup, execution, log parsing, data processing, and generation of comparison plots to align model outputs with empirical targets.
business_intent: Enable model developers and health analysts to fine‑tune COPD parameters so that simulated disease dynamics accurately reflect real‑world prevalence, incidence, and mortality, supporting evidence‑based health policy and planning.
